main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of a bright circular object that was stationary and then moved westward before disappearing over the ocean horizon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes,The object was described as a circular round fireball,The object's color changed from yellowish-orange to red,It appeared to be about 50 degrees off the horizon at one point,This sighting was reported by a civilian source in Venice, California.
